Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. It is valued at $1,500,000 by you, and I am confident it will bring significant value to your endeavors. I am offering you this remarkable item at a special price of $1,350,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic vision. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can collaborate on this exciting venture. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
